entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
